Articles.Content:
So I will give a few links to pics to help with this explanation...

So I start a new game and I am met with this screen in the mission control...

Then I began to notice that my contracts were... reseting ater every mission... so I went into debug to experiment and, after many missions....

I was only met with this screen when going back to available contracts.....

So yeah.... this obviously makes career mode unplayable and I have

- Tried reseting my contracts via debug (no effect) {Note: Tried to add a contract and it had no effect at all...}

-Tried a new save - No effect

-Tried manually deleting all the files, reinstalling and verifying the game ..... no effect...

Starting to lose hope here... hoping someone can help

Many regards, someone who is in love with version 1.0..... 2 xD

Hi jorrdann, the altitude and distance records are automatically awarded when you pass the required threshhold, are you accepting any of the four starter contracts? They must be accepted by clicking on them and clicking accept, then completed to unlock further contracts.

Also please see the support stickies and provide your game logs.
